skins.name: Default
skins.secIdle1Text: I've got plenty of pictures of Sara. 800 bucks a print!
skins.secIdle2Text: Mississippi will bring me back home just fine if I get lost!
skins.secIdle3Text: Commander, have you seen Sara? I want to try my new camera!
skins.secTouchText: Aaah, that tickles~! I can't keep the camera straight~
skins.secSpecialTouchText: Commander! If you do that again, I'll photograph it and report it to the police~

skins.name: Christmas Photoshoot
skins.secIdle1Text: Christmas special edition Saratoga photos, one thousand dollars each! Guhehe~ my fangirl power level increases during the holiday season!
skins.secIdle2Text: Commander, can you take some photos of me with Saratoga?
skins.secIdle3Text: Thanks for the waterproof camera, Commander! I'll be sure to take good care of it!
skins.secTouchText: What's in this bag? Guhehe~ an album of premium Saratoga photos! As long as I have this, she will always be at my side!
